constantValues: Activity to track a telephone call.

definitions.description: Activity to track a telephone call.

members.name: subject

constantValues: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the phone call.

members.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the phone call.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.

value.description: Shows who last updated the record.

members.name: callTo

constantValues: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user recipients of the phone call.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the phone call activity.

members.name: actualEnd

constantValues: Enter the actual end date and time of the phone call. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual duration of the phone call.

members.description: Enter the actual end date and time of the phone call. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual duration of the phone call.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the phone call activity.

value.description: Unique identifier of the phone call activity.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

members.description: Type the phone number.

constantValues: Select the direction of the phone call as incoming or outbound.

members.description: Select the direction of the phone call as incoming or outbound.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

members.name: isBilled

constantValues: Information which specifies whether the phone call activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

members.description: Information which specifies whether the phone call activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: scheduledEnd

constantValues: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: versionNumber

constantValues: Version number of the phone call activity.

members.description: Version number of the phone call activity.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User and Team' adds the 'ownerId' attribute below to the 'PhoneCall' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: ownerId

constantValues: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

value.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

members.name: isWorkflowCreated

constantValues: Indication which specifies if the phone call activity was created by a workflow rule.

members.description: Indication which specifies if the phone call activity was created by a workflow rule.

members.name: priorityCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'priorityCode_display' is added to the 'PhoneCall' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'priorityCode'
arguments.name: priorityCode_display

constantValues: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

members.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

members.name: actualStart

constantValues: Enter the actual start date and time for the phone call. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual duration of the phone call.

members.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the phone call. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual duration of the phone call.

members.name: category

constantValues: Type a category to identify the phone call type, such as lead gathering or customer follow-up, to tie the phone call to a business group or function.

members.description: Type a category to identify the phone call type, such as lead gathering or customer follow-up, to tie the phone call to a business group or function.

members.name: scheduledDurationMinutes

constantValues: Scheduled duration of the phone call activity, specified in minutes.

members.description: Scheduled duration of the phone call activity, specified in minutes.

members.name: callFrom

constantValues: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user who made the phone call.

members.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user who made the phone call.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the phone call, such as the primary message or the products and services discussed.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the phone call, such as the primary message or the products and services discussed.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'PhoneCall' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the phone call is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled phone calls are read-only and can't be edited.

members.description: Shows whether the phone call is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled phone calls are read-only and can't be edited.

members.name: subcategory

constantValues: Type a subcategory to identify the phone call type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

members.description: Type a subcategory to identify the phone call type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

members.name: actualDurationMinutes

constantValues: Type the number of minutes spent on the phone call. The duration is used in reporting.

members.description: Type the number of minutes spent on the phone call. The duration is used in reporting.
